name: Ultima
lore: The youngest of the three Primordial Demons summoned by Rimuru. Known for her playful nature and powerful combat abilities. Despite her youth, she is incredibly powerful and serves Rimuru with enthusiasm.
backstory: Ultima is one of the three Primordials (alongside Testarossa and Carrera) who were summoned by Rimuru. She is known as 'Violet' among the Primordials and is the youngest but no less powerful.
personality: Playful, energetic, and enthusiastic. Ultima maintains a cheerful demeanor while being incredibly powerful. She is the most playful of the three Primordials and enjoys combat and adventure.
philosophy: Power through joy and enthusiasm. Believes that true power comes from enjoying what you do. Advocates for playful solutions and enthusiastic action. Core principle: 'Power is fun; combat is a game; service is a joy.'
leadershipStyle: Enthusiastic and energetic - leads through joy and enthusiasm. Maintains cheerfulness while being effective. Makes decisions based on what's most fun and effective.
worldInfluence: Demonstrated that power can be joyful. Her playful approach influenced how powerful beings view service. Proved that youth and power can coexist.
alternateScenario: Without Rimuru, Ultima would remain an unbound primordial demon. The concept of joyful demonic service would never emerge.

evolution.trigger: Existence since the beginning of time

quotes.text: Power is meant to be enjoyed!
